baseDialogue.dialogue: And then when it went like baaaaam, whoosh, I was all like... woah!! Wooooooah!!!!!!
Haha, right! I liked that part too.
Wow, that really was such a good movie. Right? Right?
Yeah, it kept me on edge a crazy number of times.
Man~ that was really fun. Thanks for taking me out tonight, <color=#FFC0CB>Ravi</color>.
I just really wish we could do this more often.
It's hard for us to get our schedules to match nowadays...
With your restaurant and my day job... the only time that works is late at night, huh.
The world is so cruel!!
It's okay, I'm just glad we have this time to ourselves.
Speaking of time, it's getting pretty late isn't it?
Yeah, you're right... is it time for me to head back home?
Wait, before that, how about I cook up something for us real quick?
Ah, you're the best! I could really go for some pasta right now.
That's a bit heavy, don't you think?
Hey!
I'm kidding, I'm kidding.
That's more like it.
That reminds me, one of my regulars has been coming extra often for dinner lately.
Oh really?
Yeah. Some kid. I think his name is... <color=green>Mateo</color>? Probably? Most likely.
He eats a lot.
And keeps ordering the most garlic-y dishes.
Haha! You'd hate it, the smell is quite strong, even for me.
Yuuuup, that's a 100% no for me.
Understandably so.
Still, it's nice having a familiar face stop by.
That's sweet. He must really like you!
Haha, you think?
Have you known him for some time now?
Yeah, I think it's been a couple of years now?
Wow! So loyal!
Not as loyal as you, <color=red>Lan</color>.
Hehe.
You know...
Mm?
Is it alright if we take a picture, just this once?
I just want to preserve this memory of us. I had a really good time.
Ah...
Is it still a no?
I'm sorry, <color=#FFC0CB>Ravi</color>, you know it's just... I'm so camera shy...
It's totally okay, I won't press! It's alright.
Thank you...
(God it's awkward now! I'm a dumbass oh god...)
(I knew the answer. It's always the same.)
(But isn't it weird?)
(We've been dating all these years, yet we don't have a single photo together.)
(Whatever, that's not important, now she's just uncomfortable.)
(I'm such an asshole--)
Look, <color=#FFC0CB>Ravi</color>, there's something I've been meaning to tell you...
It's just. A bit hard for me to say.
(A bright light...)
<color=red>Lan</color>, watch out!!
BAM!
(Oh my god... my vision is so blurry...)
(A hit-and-run... this late at night?)
(Shit, I'm losing way too much blood.)
<color=red>Lan</color>... *urk*
Are you... there?
I'm right here.
It's okay. I'm [?????].
Thank god.
<color=red>Lan</color>...
Quick... *huff*
Call for... call... for an ambulance...
So this is my [?????].
I'm [?????], <color=#FFC0CB>Ravi</color>.
This is my way of [?????] you.
---DAYS LATER---
Did I get dumped?
(I don't have any memory of what happened after that night.)
(I passed out from impact, and the next time I woke up, I was in my bed.)
(It's been a couple of days, and I still haven't heard back from <color=red>Lan</color>.)
(I should have injuries from where I got hit but... it's all gone.)
God, I really can't believe this is happening.
(So my girlfriend. Ex-girlfriend? Was actually a vampire.)
(And after seeing me covered in blood, she bit me.)
(Which I guess makes me a vampire too?)
(I just can't believe I haven't noticed up until this point.)
(I didn't take <color=red>Lan</color> as a good actress.)
(Hell, she could barely lie when she tried surprising me for our anniversary.)
(But I guess this whole time we were dating... was all just one big act.)
(Did she really love me?)
My head just can't keep up.
Whatever, there's no point in... thinking about that now.
I need to focus on what's next.
I don't even have a reflection... I really am a vampire now, huh?
(This is all so surreal.)
(I ended up staying in since then.)
(Walking near the windows while the sun was still out burned my skin pretty bad,)
(even though I wasn't directly in the light.)
(But speaking of windows,)
(I've seen the same regular waiting outside the restaurant every night.)
(He knocks on the door a couple of times...)
(waits across the restaurant for a bit...)
(and heads home.)
(God, why can't he take a hint? The lights are all off, does the restaurant look open?)
(Does he really want pasta that badly?)
(There are so many other places that he could be eating instead...)
(It's not like this town is lacking in options.)
(Anyways, going outside is definitely out of the question. At least, in the day.)
(And my sense of taste is completely screwed.)
(Real food tastes like shit to me and doesn't satisfy my hunger.)
KNOCK KNOCK.
(So I've been... insanely hungry.)
(I just don't know how to quench it.)
KNOCK KNOCK KNOCK.
(Well, I'd be lying if I said that I didn't have an idea of how to quench it.)
KNOCK KNOCK KNOCK KNOCK KNOCK.
(But I really don't want to go down that route. If I can avoid it at all costs--)
KNOCK KNOCK KNOCK KNOCK KNOCK KNOCK KNOCK KNOCK KNOCK KNOCK.
God, what the actual hell!
I can't keep ignoring him... I'll just suck it up for today and figure out what gives.
<color=#FFC0CB>Chef Romano</color>.
<color=green>Mateo</color>, right? So you're here again today.
Look, we're closed. It says so on the sign in the front. Why do you keep showing up?
Well,
why have you been closed for over a week?
You know I have dinner every night here, right?
Who else is there to take responsibility but you?
You...
... Whatever. Come in and tell me what you want.
You're wearing a turtleneck today.
Huh? Oh. Yeah. I'm surprised you noticed a difference.
I mean, it's not like I come here every day or anything.
What's the occasion?
Nothing. I'm just... a little cold, that's all.
Really? In the freezing month of July?
You have a lot of sass for a kid. May I take your order please.
I'm not a kid. To start, I'll have a plate of Penne all'Arrabbiata.
(That isn't a starter, that's a full meal...)
